texts.title: Troll Shooter
features: Cross-platform: Play on your phone, tablet, and computer!
texts.short-description: A game where you shoot trolls.
texts.full-description: Take revenge on trolls once and for all in this action-packed 60fps top-down shooter! Experience the thrill of destroying trolls as you purchase multiple guns and fight your way through an endless number of trolls (because the internet is full of them).
